title: Remove the floating background-music Play button

requirements.text: Remove the floating background-music Play button from the UI so that the site never renders a Play button when background music is not currently playing.
acceptanceCriteria: When music is not playing, no floating Play button is visible anywhere on the page.
The previous 'starting' / loading indicator tied to pressing Play is not shown (because Play is no longer available).
The change is limited to UI behavior; it does not introduce any new user-facing text (all remaining user-facing text stays in English).

requirements.text: Keep the existing background-music mute and volume controls available only when background music is already playing, without adding any new way to start playback.
acceptanceCriteria: If background music is playing (e.g., user previously opted in and autoplay succeeds), the mute and volume controls still render and work.
If background music is not playing, the background-music controller renders nothing (no error toast UI, no buttons).

constraints: Do not change the existing audio asset URL/path used by the app; it must remain exactly "/assets/audio/background-dance.mp3".
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the background music track or audio file contents.
Do not add a replacement UI/setting to start music playback.
